66834.summary: Some customers in the Northwest Crescent Heights area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
66834.title: Sept 12 - Medicine Hat  (Northwest Crescent Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
